languages.text: "Нет проклятия страшнее, чем бытие между нежизнью и несмертью. Ты освободил{mf||а} страдающую душу, Домин'{name}. Неумирающий узрел содеянное тобой благо".
"There is no curse more terrible than an existence between unlife and undeath. You have liberated a tormented soul, Domin'{name}. The Undying One sees the good you have wrought."
languages.original_text: "Нет проклятия страшнее, чем бытие между нежизнью и несмертью. Ты освободил{mf||а} страдающую душу, Домин'{name}. Неумирающий узрел содеянное тобой благо".

traits.locale_text: "There is no curse more terrible than an existence between unlife and undeath. You have liberated a tormented soul, Domin'{name}. The Undying One sees the good you have wrought."
"There is no curse more terrible than an existence between unlife and undeath. You have liberated a tormented soul, Enim'{name}. The Undying One will remember it."
"There is no curse more terrible than an existence between unlife and undeath. You have liberated a tormented soul, Domin'{name}. The Undying One sees the good that you have wrought."
"There is no curse more terrible than an existence between unlife and undeath. You have liberated a tormented soul, Domin'{name}. The Undying One will remember this."
"There is no curse more terrible than an existence between unlife and undeath. You have liberated a tormented soul, Domin'{name}. The Undying One sees the good you have wrought."
"There is no curse more terrible than an existence between unlife and undeath. You have liberated a tormented soul, Domin'{name}. The Undying One sees the good you have wrought."
"There is no curse more terrible than an existence between unlife and undeath. You have liberated a tormented soul, Domin'{name}. The Undying One sees the good that you have wrought."
"There is no curse more terrible than an existence between unlife and undeath. You have liberated a tormented soul, Domin'{name}. The Undying One sees the good you have wrought."

languages.text: « Il n'est de pire malédiction qu'une existence prise au piège entre la non-vie et la non-mort. Vous avez libéré une âme tourmentée, Domin'{name}. L'Immortel vous en sait gré. »
languages.original_text: "There is no curse more terrible than an existence between unlife and undeath. You have liberated a tormented soul, Domin'{name}. The Undying One sees the good you have wrought."

traits.locale_text: « Il n'est de pire malédiction qu'une existence prise au piège entre la non-vie et la non-mort. Vous avez libéré une âme tourmentée, Domin'{name}. L'Immortel vous en sait gré. »

languages.text: «No hay mayor maldición que una existencia que se debate entre la no vida y la no muerte. Ha liberado un alma torturada, Domin'{name}. El Inmortal ha sido testigo del bien que ha obrado hoy».
languages.original_text: "There is no curse more terrible than an existence between unlife and undeath. You have liberated a tormented soul, Domin'{name}. The Undying One sees the good you have wrought."

traits.locale_text: «No hay mayor maldición que una existencia que se debate entre la no vida y la no muerte. Ha liberado un alma torturada, Domin'{name}. El Inmortal ha sido testigo del bien que ha obrado hoy».

languages.text: 「生と死の狭間にある状態ほど恐ろしい呪いはない。あなたは苦しむ魂を解放したのよ、ドミン・{name}。不死の者は、あなたがもたらした善行を見ておられます」
languages.original_text: "There is no curse more terrible than an existence between unlife and undeath. You have liberated a tormented soul, Domin'{name}. The Undying One sees the good you have wrought."

traits.locale_text: 「生と死の狭間にある状態ほど恐ろしい呪いはない。あなたは苦しむ魂を解放したのよ、ドミン・{name}。不死の者は、あなたがもたらした善行を見ておられます」

languages.text: “最可怕的诅咒，莫过于身处‘非生’与‘非死’之间的状态。你刚刚解放了一个饱受折磨的灵魂，秘者{name}，不死之神看到了你的善行。”
languages.original_text: "There is no curse more terrible than an existence between unlife and undeath. You have liberated a tormented soul, Domin'{name}. The Undying One sees the good you have wrought."

traits.locale_text: “最可怕的诅咒，莫过于身处‘非生’与‘非死’之间的状态。你刚刚解放了一个饱受折磨的灵魂，秘者{name}，不死之神看到了你的善行。”

languages.text: "Es gibt keinen grausameren Fluch als eine Existenz zwischen Unleben und Untod. Ihr habt eine gequälte Seele befreit, Domin'{name}. Der Todlose sieht das Gute, das Ihr gesponnen habt."
languages.original_text: "There is no curse more terrible than an existence between unlife and undeath. You have liberated a tormented soul, Domin'{name}. The Undying One sees the good you have wrought."

traits.locale_text: "Es gibt keinen grausameren Fluch als eine Existenz zwischen Unleben und Untod. Ihr habt eine gequälte Seele befreit, Domin'{name}. Der Todlose sieht das Gute, das Ihr gesponnen habt."

languages.text: "Yaşamsızlık ve ölümsüzlük arasında kalmaktan daha feci bir lanet yoktur. İşkence çeken bir ruhu özgür bıraktın Domin'{name}. Ölmeyen, yaptığın iyiliği görüyor."
languages.original_text: "There is no curse more terrible than an existence between unlife and undeath. You have liberated a tormented soul, Domin'{name}. The Undying One sees the good you have wrought."
